text: Timothy James McVeigh (April 23, 1968 â€“ June 11, 2001) was a United States Army veteran and security guard who bombed the Alfred P. Murrah Federal Building in Oklahoma City. He was convicted of 11 United States federal offenses, and was sentenced to death and executed for his role in the April 19, 1995 bombing. Immediately prior to his execution, McVeigh observed the Last Rites with a Catholic priest. == References == Category:American murderers Category:American terrorists Category:Criminals from New York (state) Category:Executed American people Category:People executed by lethal injection Category:1968 births Category:2001 deaths Category:People from Lockport, New York Category:American Roman Catholics
title: Timothy McVeigh
